title: Bug 2172[Dialogs] Cannot copy errors in a Multi error dialog.
description: Bug 2172[Dialogs] Cannot copy errors in a Multi error dialog. This would be useful for the user as it would allow them to copy and paste errors (which wealso can't do currently).NOTES:
OB: The error dialog with details does not allow the user to select all of the details as it is singleselect.
